pkgmetadata.longdescription: Lightweight Graph Based Multiple Comparison Procedures // A lightweight fork of 'gMCP' with functions for graphical described multiple test procedures introduced in Bretz et al. (2009) doi:10.1002/sim.3495 and Bretz et al. (2011) doi:10.1002/bimj.201000239. Implements a flexible function using 'ggplot2' to create multiplicity graph visualizations. Contains instructions of multiplicity graph and graphical testing for group sequential design, described in Maurer and Bretz (2013) doi:10.1080/19466315.2013.807748, with necessary unit testing using 'testthat'.
